The tool is actually wonderful. I've used it for years. BUT. And it's an enormous BUT.

This extension overrides and locks your notification settings (along with other settings) so that you can't change them. Because of that, any website can now constantly send you notifications and spam you all of the time.

How about the fact that any of those notifications of links that they send could be a virus. That enough evidence for you sir?

I used to love this but recently it has started to allow all notifications on all sites, without any option to turn notifications off. It makes me turn it off.
EDIT: Apparently this has been fixed since version 0.4.8 but it seems I had to "Reset Disable Features" under the Disable tab https://chrispederick.com/work/web-developer/help/#allow-notifications. Thanks Chris! Now 5 stars.

I use this tool to aid in accessibility testing alongside WAVE and Axe, it does exactly what it says it does. It makes my job easier and it is open source! Thank you Chris and all the other open source contributors for making this tool and giving it away for free!

I've been using this extension for years, and honestly can't live without it in terms of web design. Its most valuable feature is the Edit CSS function, which allows you to actually see what you're doing and edit CSS in realtime. The Responsive Layouts and Window Resize are crucial for any self-respecting web designer in this mobile-site-driven age in which we now live. It's a free extension packing premium content. Thank you so much, Chris, for building this tool and distributing it for free... Show more

Today I found my first issue, and Chris showed me the solution so I'll share it here: 

This extension seems to over-ride the default "always ask" way of dealing with notification permissions, as I got a notification today from a domain which I never approved, and it appears this extension is what allowed that to occur.

To fix this you can remove the over-ride settings by selecting ‘Disable’ -> ‘Reset Disable Features’ option in the extension.
